snippet.title: The First Descendant│Official Launch Date Reveal│Summer Game Fest 2024
snippet.description:
JULY 2! The wait is almost over! The next-gen looter shooter, The First Descendant, launches on July 2. Add it to your wishlist to stay updated and be among the first to play.
Wishlist Now: https://tfd.nexon.com/
 
Launching July 2 on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox, The First Descendant is a next generation third-person co-op action RPG shooter (looter shooter) featuring high-quality graphics developed using Unreal Engine 5. It presents fun strategic boss fights through 4-player co-op, various unique characters, exciting gunplay, and looting.

⭐️Follow us and receive our latest news!⭐️
Official Website: https://tfd.nexon.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FirstDescendant  
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FirstDescendant  
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/thefirstdescendant  
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRjkGad-W6aGpLcZ0AKealg

#TheFirstDescendant #TFD #lootershooter #shooter #coop #action #RPG #UE5 #UnrealEngine5 #crossplay #FirstDescendant #Descendants #steam #xbox #playstation #launch #release #launchdate #releasedate #officialrelease #officiallaunch #PS4 #PS5 #XboxOne #XboxSeriesS #XboxSeriesX
